def start_real_time_intelligence_monitoring(self):
    def intelligence_loop():
        while True:
            try:
                # Collect and analyze data
                unified_data = self.collect_unified_intelligence_data()
                metrics = self.analyze_with_intelligence(unified_data)
                
                # Display intelligence updates every 5 minutes
                time.sleep(300)
            except Exception as e:
                time.sleep(60)  # Shorter retry interval
```

def start_automation_monitoring(self):
    def automation_loop():
        while self.automation_active:
            try:
                self.execute_automation_cycle()
                time.sleep(300)  # 5-minute automation cycles
            except Exception as e:
                time.sleep(60)
```
